title: Preparation and measurement of a sandwiched Sn atomic beam source for laser resonance ionization mass spectrometry
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15328-15336
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02689F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiangfan Wang, Jinlong Fan, Zhiming Li, Wenliang Wang, Lei Feng, Pengfei Zhang, Guowei Chen, Xiaowei Yi, Xiangbo Zhang, Xiaopan Shen, Jiang Xu
Different amounts of Sn sources were prepared by electrodeposition and tested via LRIMS. For the determination of ultra-trace nuclide, a sandwiched structure has been successfully developed for a more efficient and stable atomic beam source.
